body:
Hi Jack,

I edited the file as you suggested but still it exits with
'missing.'. Here's the latest file.

Surface Tr      Tg      Tb      Rcr     Rcg     Rcb     Rgr     Rgg
Rgb     Part
a       0.862   0.890   0.886   0.074   0.077   0.079   0.074   0.077
0.079   0
b       0.756   0.808   0.744   0.042   0.049   0.043   0.065   0.058
0.067   0

I've been testing other options in the input file like having only one
line input but it still exits after asking for glazing type. I'll try
to check with it again to see if I could get it to work :)  Thank you
very much for your help.

Siritip
subject: [Radiance-general] Glaze.csh header and input format
